description: To provide scholarship assistance to students within the College of Education & Professional Studies majoring in Library Media Education. Eligibility Requirements This scholarship is open to any graduate student majoring in Library Media Education or students who already hold a masterÂ’s degree but are seeking school library media specialist certification Minimum 3.0 GPA Student must provide a personal essay describing "the value of a strong school library" Selection Process Recipients of the scholarship will be selected by a departmental committee Award Requirements Must be enrolled in the upcoming fall and spring semester to receive award Attendance at an awards banquet is required for all recipients Recipients must write a thank you letter to the donors of the scholarship
